title: Insult to Injury
brief_description: A Greek factory employee injured his back at work. This program examines the problems that he encountered with doctors, Workers’ Compensation, and Unions, and their attitudes towards him.
description: A Greek factory employee injured his back at work. This program examines the problems that he encountered with doctors, Workers’ Compensation, and Unions, and their attitudes towards him.
